name: beatWavez
tag: A karaoke party app, where users can create and join party rooms, chat, and add songs to a shared queue.
contributions: Remotely mob and pair programmed with a team of five in a two week sprint.
Wielded the power of the Material UI library to implement the mobile first design.

name: Pixel Pusher
tag: Pixel Pusher is an art app for the terminal, remotely mob and pair programmed in a two week sprint.
contributions: Strategically organized the file structure to maintain navigable code.
Devised the base brush shape whose style and size is modified through multiple parameters to create other brushes.

name: Else By Elsewhere
tag: Else By Elsewhere is a geo guessing game built in a remote one week sprint on a team of four.
contributions: Wove together multiple APIs to create our own RESTful API for this full-stack React app.
Built the wireframes, implemented the design, and used my sharp eye for detail to catch bugs and refactor to create cleaner code.
